text: Vanguard Newspaper is a daily newspaper published in Lagos, Nigeria in both papers and online. It was founded by Sam Amuka whom is a journalist alongside his three friends in 1984. It is a news sources with other Nigerian newspapers including This Day, The Punch, The Sun (Nigeria) and The Guardian (Nigeria). ==Related pages== * Newspapers published in Nigeria ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Newspapers published in Nigeria
title: Vanguard Newspaper
